fpmExplorer:Page.title: File Upload and Download
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Field building block enables you to render fields with file upload and download capabilities.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can bind Edm.Stream properties to the Field. Specify its content type and acceptable types via Core.MediaType and Core.AcceptableMediaTypes annotations. Core.ContentDisposition.Filename defines the file name to be displayed.
